newsitem.title: USA: United States designing new nuclear arms - NYT.
newsitem.headline: United States designing new nuclear arms - NYT.

text.p: The United States is at work on new or modified designs for nuclear arms, even though the Cold War is over, the New York Times reported on Monday, citing a formerly secret Energy Department document.
The document shows that the United Staets is undermining a treaty intended to halt innovations in making weapons of mass destruction, the newspaper said.

Energy Department officials denied the assertion, saying the work complied with the international treaty. The officials said the work was only to modernize old weapon designs, according to the newspaper.
The document said the work exercises a broad range of design skills, including steps toward redesigning the heart of the hydrogen bomb, the paper said.
The document was obtained by the Natural Resources Defense Council -- a private Washington group that advocates arms control -- and turned over to the Times, the newspaper said.
